page.title: 01FORRES EAST
page.content: This is a low-lying are which slopes gently from South to North towards the {Moray Firth}.It is a very rich farming area as it is low-lying,gently sloping with very fertile soils.Part of the town of {Forres},mostly residential, lies in the south-west corner of the block,and the golf course is also found in this area.The{main road}and railway line linking Aberdeen and Inverness run from east to west through the block.There is also some woodland in the block,most of which is {coniferous}.There are a number of interesting {historical}features to be found in the area,including {Sueno's {Stone}and remains on {Cluny Hill}.
